contents: This license is similar to NTP, but it omits the language regarding reproduction of copyright and permission notices. It also omits the phrase "with or without fee".

raw.standardLicenseTemplate:
<<beginOptional>>NTP No Attribution (NTP-0)

<<endOptional>> <<var;name="copyright";original="Copyright (4-digit-year) by (CopyrightHoldersName)  ";match=".{0,5000}">>

Permission to use, copy, modify, and distribute this software and its documentation for any purpose is hereby granted, provided that the name<<beginOptional>>s<<endOptional>>of <<var;name="TMname";original="(TrademarkedName)";match=".+">> not be used in advertising or publicity pertaining to distribution of the software without specific, written prior permission. <<var;name="TMname";original="(TrademarkedName)";match=".+">> make<<beginOptional>>s<<endOptional>>no representations about the suitability of this software for any purpose. It is provided "as is" without express or implied warranty.
